newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai baht/dlr spread seen narrowing in 2 weeks.
newsitem.headline: Thai baht/dlr spread seen narrowing in 2 weeks.

text.p: Bank of Thailand assistant governor Siri Garnjarerndee said on Thursday it would take about one to two weeks for the wide baht/dollar spread to narrow because the market needed time to fathom the new baht system.
"The (bid/offer) spread should be narrower in the next one to two weeks. It has to take some time because the bank just adopted the new foreign exchange system yesterday," he told reporters.
